name: Ravenous Hydra
passive: Cleave: Attacks deal physical damage to other enemies near the target. Active: Deal damage to nearby enemies (10 second cooldown).
active:
):  When activated, your attcks over the 9s deal physical damage equal to 14 AD as splash damage to nearby enemies. Melee attacks deal splash damage in a bigger area than ranged attacks. (30s Cooldown) 500


Ravenous Hydra TIPS: This enchant turns your boots into a deadly whirlwind: after activation, your attacks briefly explode, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Melee hits cover a larger area, but ranged champions benefit too.  — Perfect for bruisers and tanks who want to make every strike an AOE threat in skirmishes.
description:

(30s Cooldown) 500


Ravenous Hydra TIPS: This enchant turns your boots into a deadly whirlwind: after activation, your attacks briefly explode, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Melee hits cover a larger area, but ranged champions benefit too.  — Perfect for bruisers and tanks who want to make every strike an AOE threat in skirmishes.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
